name: Balloon Chase Journey
description:
The game develop team Draw Flipped Studio is made up of two amateur game enthusiasts, our major careers are from other unrelated industries. Because we like playing games and are fond of digital art, we want to do some staff for relax and realize our dream after work, so we created this simple indie game little by little based on the joyful memories of childhood game. Hope this little funny game can bring pure happiness for everyone.

Contact us

Want to keep up with the latest news of Balloon Chase Journey? Welcome to follow us!
